tool_description: Monitors the performance impact of pricing changes by tracking key metrics like sales volume, revenue, conversion rates, and competitive position over time.

monitoring_period_days.description: Number of days to monitor performance metrics

metrics_to_track.description: Performance metrics to monitor: sales, revenue, margin, conversion, competition

comparison_baseline.description: Baseline for comparison: previous_period, same_period_last_year, or custom

error_messages: Invalid monitoring period: monitoring_period_days must be between 1 and 365 days.
Invalid metrics: metrics_to_track must contain only [sales, revenue, margin, conversion, competition].
Invalid comparison baseline: comparison_baseline must be one of [previous_period, same_period_last_year, custom].
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the specified monitoring period.
usage: Configure monitoring_period_days and metrics_to_track to monitor pricing performance. Set comparison_baseline to define how performance is measured.

monitoring_timestamp.description: When the performance monitoring was conducted

performance_scores.description: Performance scores for each tracked metric

trend_indicators.description: Trend direction for each metric: improving, stable, or declining

optimization_suggestions.description: Suggestions for pricing optimization based on performance
